meanings.definition: Selected as the best or most appropriate
meanings.sent1: The chosen book was the one with the prettiest cover.
meanings.sent2: She wore her chosen outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The chosen dessert was a surprise to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The chosen path led to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The chosen flower bloomed brightly in the garden.

meanings.definition: Designated or picked out from a group
meanings.sent1: The chosen player scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent2: The chosen color for the room was a calming blue.
meanings.sent3: The chosen toy was the missing piece of the puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The chosen key unlocked the mysterious door.
meanings.sent5: The chosen song played softly in the background.

meanings.sent1: Her chosen movie was a classic favorite.
meanings.sent2: The chosen flavor of ice cream was chocolate.
meanings.sent3: The chosen pet was a mischievous kitten.
meanings.sent4: The chosen friend always had good advice.
meanings.sent5: The chosen book was read over and over again.
